filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Recent rainfall patterns in the area have significantly impacted t.json

chunks.chunk_text: John, where's your brother?How about going to movie?Sure, the music was great.I like jogging, hiking and dancing.I still have ten more minutes to play.Excuse me, is this seat taken?歡迎收聽齊彬老師的超級英語通Welcome to English All Pass with Kenneth Chee
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Recent rainfall patterns in the area have significantly impacted t.json

chunks.chunk_text: Hello everyone, welcome to News English All Pass.My name is Kenneth Chee,歡迎收聽新聞英語通。我是齊彬老師。In this unit, we'll be learning about news. 這個單元,我們要來學習的是新聞英語。So first, let's listen to today's news. 首先,我們來聽一下今天的新聞。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Recent rainfall patterns in the area have significantly impacted t.json

chunks.chunk_text: So first, let's listen to
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Recent rainfall patterns in the area have significantly impacted t.json

chunks.chunk_text: 這篇的報導講的是rainfall patterns,說的是降雨的形態。趕快來看一下它的重點。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Recent rainfall patterns in the area have significantly impacted t.json

chunks.chunk_text: 過去的一個月中,本地區經歷了間歇性鎮雨。接著繼續解釋到
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Recent rainfall patterns in the area have significantly impacted t.json

chunks.chunk_text: 降雨既帶來了好處,也帶來了挑戰。這裡的benefit是名詞,意思是好處。就好的一面來說,降雨緩解了急需的乾旱狀況,補充了水分,並滋養了農作物。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Recent rainfall patterns in the area have significantly impacted t.json

chunks.chunk_text: On the positive side,偏於正面的一面,好的一面來說,provide,動詞,提供,much needed,這是一個複合形容詞,表示是很需要的。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Recent rainfall patterns in the area have significantly impacted t.json

chunks.chunk_text: Nourish,原來是一個動詞,就是提供養分滋養。這邊也是分詞,所以用and連接了兩個分詞。最後的crop,指的是農作物。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Recent rainfall patterns in the area have significantly impacted t.json

chunks.chunk_text: 可以確保農作物的健康生長,以及糧食安全。Be crucial for,偏於對什麼來說,很重要。從insuring,到最後,這整個是分詞構句。insure,原來是個動詞,就是確保的意思。最後再說明一些細節。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Recent rainfall patterns in the area have significantly impacted t.json

chunks.chunk_text: 已經有報導說,一些地區出現局部淹水,會導致財產損失和交通中斷。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Recent rainfall patterns in the area have significantly impacted t.json

chunks.chunk_text: 是分詞當作形容詞用,就是當地化的。從which,到最後的transportation,這邊是一個relative clause,是一個關係子句。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Recent rainfall patterns in the area have significantly impacted t.json

chunks.chunk_text: 建議居民在強降雨期間保持警惕,並採取適當的預防措施。比如,避開容易淹水發生的地區,並確認房屋周圍的排水系統。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Recent rainfall patterns in the area have significantly impacted t.json

chunks.chunk_text: 這是一個介系詞叫做像式,所以這邊的avoiding,還有and後面的insuring,就是動名詞囉,是作為suggest的授詞。最後proper,形容詞,適當的、恰當的。本篇我們要看一個慣用句型。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Recent rainfall patterns in the area have significantly impacted t.json

chunks.chunk_text: 這對什麼尤其的重要。看一下另一句。這對農業尤其重要。再看一句。這對氣候友善的車輛來說尤其重要。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Recent rainfall patterns in the area have significantly impacted t.json

chunks.chunk_text: recent,形容詞最近的、近來的。pattern,名詞、方式、形式、模式。significantly,副詞顯著地,在相當大的程度上。impact,動詞產生影響。intermittent shower,名詞、間歇語。benefit,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Recent rainfall patterns in the area have significantly impacted t.json

chunks.chunk_text: 名詞、利益、好處。challenge,名詞、挑戰、考驗。on the positive side,片語、好的、正面的一面來說。releaffron,片語、緩解。replenish,動詞補充、重新裝滿。source,名詞、來源、出處。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Recent rainfall patterns in the area have significantly impacted t.json

chunks.chunk_text: nourish,動詞、養育、滋養。surplus,名詞、勝於、過剩。localized,形容詞、當地的、局部的。transportation,名詞、運輸、交通工具。vigilant,形容詞、警覺的、警戒的。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Recent rainfall patterns in the area have significantly impacted t.json

chunks.chunk_text: blood prom,形容詞、容易發生洪水的。proper,形容詞、適當的、恰當的。drainage,名詞、排水系統、排污系統。OK, that's all for this unit.最後請記得,每日十分鐘讓您變成英語通。我是啟稟老師。until then, see you next time.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Recent rainfall patterns in the area have significantly impacted t.json

chunks.chunk_text: 超級英語通系列課程由啟稟老師製作主持。課程講義請上網查詢。網址是www.ner.gov.cw
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Recent rainfall patterns in the area have significantly impacted t.json
